MainLayout.description: Dynamic web portfolio developed with Next.js and React, designed to showcase projects, skills, and professional experience of a web developer. Implements a modern and optimized architecture for smooth and responsive navigation, with support for dark and light themes, internationalization, and instant static deployment.

MainSection.catchphrase: Crafting Digital Experiences with Code and Creativity
MainSection.introduction01: I am a front-end developer with a strong background and experience in industrial engineering, holding a degree from the National University of Colombia, and I specialize in using Next.js as my primary tool to create modern and dynamic web experiences.
MainSection.introduction02: My web development training has been guided by some of the most influential names in the industry, such as Stephen Grider, Maximilian SchwarzmÃ¼ller, and Jonas Schmedtmann, through their renowned courses on Udemy. Additionally, I have honed my skills with the iconic book JavaScript: The Definitive Guide by David Flanagan, and of course, Learning TypeScript by Josh Goldberg, which has enabled me to design and develop visually appealing and highly functional websites.

HomePage.sectionTitleCatchPhrase: Modern tools for a world in constant change.
HomePage.sectionTitleSubtext: A stack highly adaptable to the needs of speed, great development experience, and maintainability.
HomePage.sectionTitleSubtextEducation: Thanks to my experience in industrial engineering, project management, and team leadership, I not only offer technical solutions but also bring a strategic approach that adds value to any project I am involved in.
HomePage.finalSentence: I am currently expanding my knowledge in Node.js and PostgreSQL, aiming to develop robust, maintainable, and fast web applications aligned with industry best standards and practices.
